original_title: En helt vanlig dag på jobben
overview: A young man dreams of becoming a journalist, in order to write stories which may change the world. This does not turn out as planned, and instead he ends up as a reporter for the celebrity magazine Se og Hør. We are observing a man who gradually loses all inhibitions in order to reach the top in the country's largest weekly magazine.
tagline: Spillefilmen om den vannvittige avsløringen av norsk sladderpresse!
title: En helt vanlig dag på jobben
